name: T - Alexis Noelle
_source: speak;Alexis; Oops! Sorry, my bad!{w} When I get pumped, I just look for the nearest thing and <bconvo>PUNCH!</>
speak;Noelle; Well, watch it{tgm}...{tgm} I don't want Grace getting hurt.
speak;Alexis; Huh? Grace? You mean your wyvern?
speak;Noelle; Of course! Why wouldn't she have a name?
speak;Alexis; Ah, it makes sense, I guess{tgm}...
speak;Alexis; Argh! I've paused too long!{w} The heat in my blood's cooled down!
speak;Alexis; I've got to go punch something to get my blood pumping again
speak;Alexis; See you when the fight's done!
speak;Noelle; Oh man{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Maybe I should've stayed back at home{tgm}...
